name: Game Of Thrones
summary:
Game of Thrones is a role-playing video game based on A Game of Thrones, the first of the A Song of Ice and Fire novels by George R. R. Martin, and in part also on the novels' TV adaptation by HBO, Game of Thrones.
　　The game was developed by Cyanide and published by Atlus in North America and Focus Home Interactive in Europe and Australia. It was released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 on May 15, 2012 in North America, and is to be released on June 1, 2012 in Europe and on June 7, 2012 in Australia.
info:
